org.greatage.ioc
Interface ServiceResources<T>

Type Parameters:
T - service type
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceAdditionalResources, ServiceBuildResources, ServiceConfigureResources, ServiceDecorateResources, ServiceInitialResources
public interface ServiceResources<T>

This class represents service resources that may be provided to a service when it initializes, are configurated or are decorated. It also provides access to other services.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

getResource(Class<E> resourceClass, Annotation... annotations)

Method Detail

getServiceId

String getServiceId()
Gets unique service id used to locate the service object.

Returns:
unique service id, not null

getServiceClass

Class<T> getServiceClass()
Gets service interface that both service implementation and service proxy will implement.

Returns:
service interface, not null

getServiceScope

String getServiceScope()
Gets service scope. ScopeManager service must be configured to understand this value of scope.

Returns:
service scope, not null

getResource

<E> E getResource(Class<E> resourceClass,
                  Annotation... annotations)
Gets resource to service by its type and annotations used. It can provide logger for service, injected symbols configured by SymbolSource (needs Symbol annotation), injected services by id (needs Inject annotation) or services by their interfaces by default.

Type Parameters:
E - resource type
Parameters:
resourceClass - resource class
annotations - resource annotation
Returns:
requested resource that implements specified class
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an error occurs instantiating resource
